channel.title: Certifications on Patrick S. Kelso

item.title: IT Certifications
item.description: This is a rehash of advice I regularly give undergraduate students at UTS when they ask me what certification they should get. I recently received responses for an RFQ for a review of our AWS & Azure governance & architecture. Some vendors had heaps of certs for one cloud, but none for the other. Only one had people that were well rounded with both certs and experience in both. Which makes picking the vendor really easy.
